title: @riot: a potential fix for the autofill debate.
body:
Mabye garenteing support A- to S+ would cuase not only more diversity as people pick their comfort picks but would also get more people interested in the support role as a whole, thereby getting the whole playerbase more interested in the vision game.

im low elo and understand i dont know everything, but perhaps since the getting tokens revolves so much around CS rather than teamplay you could make the support role a high mastery role to convince people to main it and learn it better?

i just wanna help game health please dont downvote or flame, positive debating welcome!
